TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ZoomMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the zoom mode for the ReportViewer control.
Docs.remarks: ## Remarks This enumerator is used with the <xref:Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ReportViewer.ZoomMode%2A> property.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ZoomMode FullPage = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Sets the zoom mode to full page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ZoomMode PageWidth = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Sets the zoom mode to page width.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Reporting.WinForms.ZoomMode Percent = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Sets the zoom mode to a percentage.
